item.title: Herbal Tea Feedback No. 22
item.description: To better summarize the healing effect of herbal tea on people who contracted Covid-19 or suffered from similar symptoms, this article is another extract of feedback from 12 cases of people in the U.S. who requested our free Covid-19 online consultation service during the pandemic. Note: The age of people taking the herbal tea varies from 16 to 63. Case 1 (Below is the detailed feedback in the image above)

item.title: Herbal Tea Feedback No. 24
item.description: To better summarize the healing effect of herbal tea on people who contracted Covid-19 or suffered from similar symptoms, this article is another extract of feedback from 10 cases of people in the U.S. who requested our free Covid-19 online consultation service during the pandemic. Note: The age of people taking the herbal tea varies from 11 to 69. Case #1 Age: 63 Original symptoms: body fatigue, low fever, sniffing,
